sqlMap.statement:
SELECT IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER ,IF.CFS_FUND_APP_NUM ,IF.CFS_FUND_CUST_NM ,IF.CFS_FUND_PO_NUM ,IF.CFS_FUND_PO_AMT ,IF.CFS_FUND_CR_AMT ,CASE WHEN IF.LTST_BKNG_CMNT_TS = '000' THEN NULL ELSE IF.LTST_BKNG_CMNT_TS END LTST_BKNG_CMNT_TS ,IF.LTST_BKNG_CMNT_TXT ,IF.LEASE_CMPY_USR_ID ,IF.LEASE_CMPY_USR_NM ,IF.EZINTIME
,IF.CFS_PO_CRAT_TS
FROM NWCI0120_01 IF WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM CFS_LEASE_PO_INFO PI WHERE PI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND UPPER(PI.CFS_APP_NUM) = UPPER(IF.CFS_FUND_APP_NUM) AND UPPER(PI.CFS_PO_NUM) = UPPER(IF.CFS_FUND_PO_NUM)
AND PI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AND IF.CFS_FUND_APP_NUM IS NOT NULL AND IF.CFS_FUND_CUST_NM IS NOT NULL AND IF.CFS_FUND_PO_NUM IS NOT NULL AND IF.CFS_FUND_PO_AMT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SEGMENT_ID ,UNIT_ID ,SEQ_NUMBER
